information: We, CGN Pharma, are a pharmaceutical wholesaler located in Cologne, Germany. Our main business is the import and export of branded pharmaceuticals and cosmetic products. We operate as a wholesaler for pharmacies, hospitals, national authorities and other wholesalers to grant the availability of medical standard range and especially niche products. These niche products are mostly orphan drugs or innovations which are not available in the destination countries. Our logistical concept enables us to satisfy your wishes and needs from single packages up to large orders. Please find our product list attached. We will gladly inform you about prices and availability on request. Always happy to hear from you.
keywords: Pharmaceuticals – import-export, pharmaceutical products, Wholesaler, Branded, Import - Export
